A liberal governor who wanted us to believe he is strong on defense.
A liberal senator who wanted us to believe he was a man of the people.
And a Massachusetts moderate who runs away from Ronald Reagan.
Look, I was an Independent during the time of Reagan-Bush.
I'm not trying to return to Reagan-Bush.
...and given the choice to vote in the Democrat or Republican primary,...
...voting for a liberal Democrat instead of President George H. W. Bush.
Romney opposed the contract with America, raised taxes...
